    • logActivity

      public void logActivity() throws IOException
      Writes the login_activity file if login is successful or not. DateTimeFormatter and string will write to the file as "admin has logged on at Sun,05-05-2024 05:20:04 PM" with username if login is good or failed then the day followed by Month, date, year and time
      Throws:
      IOException
